item.title: Coming soon
item.dc:creator: Neil Vedi
item.description:
Hi! This is starshipNeil. This a basic first post on my new blog! What will I be blogging about? Math, quantitative finance, infosec, ai/ml, puzzles and related topics. I like stuff that has to do with math, basically - it makes me feel like I'm using my brain.

That's it for my first post, I'll try posting more as soon as I can. I'm focusing on quality over quantity, although I also believe quantity leads to quality. It's a balance I'll have to figure out on my own. See you!
